text: Before he could open his mouth, the collector stretched out a hand. 'Watch your step there, sir! Your briefcase is hanging open. You'll have someone shoving their hot little hands inside. Here, I'll do it.' The collector pressed the twinkling catch home with a click. Cecil, irretrievably laden with both briefcase and conscience, stumbled away into the darkness.
handwritten_text: Before he could open his mouth, the collector stretched out a hand. 'Watch your step there, sir! Your briefcase is hanging open. You'll have someone shoving their hot little hands inside. Here, I'll do it.' The collector pressed the twinkling catch home with a click. Cecil, irretrievably laden with both briefcase and conscience, stumbled away into the darkness.
